src:
Maritime Bulletin Daily Nov 01 – 02
02 Nov 2019, 05:45 by Mikhail Voytenko
Accidents• Tanker explosion, 3 crew died, Nakhodka, Japan sea• Danish freighter collided with German ferry in Rostock harbor• Ferry collided with passenger ramp, Bakauheni• Greek Suezmax tanker named as main suspect in Brazil major oil spill• Aground and Not Under Command vessels Worldwide Alerts (3 ships)
Details only for subscribers.Annual subscription $750. For annual subscription, contact vmd@odin.tcSubscribe if you want to receive accidents news ASAP and in full.
